1.name: Psycho
1.description: A Phoenix secretary embezzles forty thousand dollars from her employer's client, goes on the run, and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.

2.name: Spartacus
2.description: The slave Spartacus leads a violent revolt against the decadent Roman Republic.

3.name: The Magnificent Seven
3.description: Seven gunfighters are hired by Mexican peasants to liberate their village from oppressive bandits.

4.name: The City of the Dead
4.description: A young college student arrives in a sleepy Massachusetts town to research witchcraft; during her stay at an eerie inn, she discovers a startling secret about the town and its inhabitants.

5.name: The Apartment
5.description: A man tries to rise in his company by letting its executives use his apartment for trysts, but complications and a romance of his own ensue.

6.name: À bout de souffle
6.description: A small-time thief steals a car and impulsively murders a motorcycle policeman. Wanted by the authorities, he reunites with a hip American journalism student and attempts to persuade her to run away with him to Italy.

7.name: La dolce vita
7.description: A series of stories following a week in the life of a philandering paparazzo journalist living in Rome.

8.name: The Time Machine
8.description: A man's vision for a utopian society is disillusioned when travelling forward into time reveals a dark and dangerous society.

9.name: 13 Ghosts
9.description: A family inherits what proves to be a haunted house, but a special pair of goggles allows them to see their ghostly tormentors.

10.name: Les yeux sans visage
10.description: A surgeon causes an accident which leaves his daughter disfigured, and goes to extremes to give her a new face.

11.name: The Little Shop of Horrors
11.description: A clumsy young man nurtures a plant and discovers that it's carnivorous, forcing him to kill to feed it.

12.name: Plein soleil
12.description: Tom Ripley is a talented mimic, moocher, forger and all-around criminal improviser; but there's more to Tom Ripley than even he can guess.

13.name: The Alamo
13.description: In 1836, a small band of soldiers sacrifice their lives in hopeless combat against a massive army in order to prevent a tyrant from smashing the new Republic of Texas.

14.name: Swiss Family Robinson
14.description: A Swiss family must survive being shipwrecked on a deserted island.

15.name: Ocean's Eleven
15.description: Danny Ocean gathers a group of his World War II compatriots to pull off the ultimate Las Vegas heist. Together the eleven friends plan to rob five Las Vegas casinos in one night.

16.name: Peeping Tom
16.description: A young man murders women, using a movie camera to film their dying expressions of terror.

17.name: La maschera del demonio
17.description: A vengeful witch and her fiendish servant return from the grave and begin a bloody campaign to possess the body of the witch's beautiful look-alike descendant, with only the girl's brother and a handsome doctor standing in her way.

18.name: Inherit the Wind
18.description: Based on a real-life case in 1925, two great lawyers argue the case for and against a science teacher accused of the crime of teaching evolution.

19.name: Exodus
19.description: The state of Israel is created in 1948, resulting in war with its Arab neighbors.

20.name: Rocco e i suoi fratelli
20.description: Having recently been uprooted to Milan, Rocco and his four brothers each look for a new way in life when a prostitute comes between Rocco and his brother Simone.

21.name: The Unforgiven
21.description: The neighbors of a frontier family turn on them when it is suspected that their adopted daughter was stolen from the local Kiowa tribe.

22.name: Bottoms Up
22.description: Jimmy Edwards reprises his TV and radio role as the Professor trying to control a school full of naughty boys.

23.name: La vérité
23.description: A liberated small-town girl and the family's black sheep moves to Paris with her sister, only to find herself standing trial for the shocking murder of her young lover. Was his killing premeditated or was this a crime of passion?

24.name: L'Avventura
24.description: A woman disappears during a Mediterranean boating trip. During the search, her lover and her best friend become attracted to each other.

25.name: House of Usher
25.description: Upon entering his fiancée's family mansion, a man discovers a savage family curse and fears that his future brother-in-law has entombed his bride-to-be prematurely.

26.name: Jungfrukällan
26.description: An innocent yet pampered young virgin and her family's pregnant and jealous servant set out to deliver candles to church, but only one returns from events that transpire in the woods along the way.

27.name: Pollyanna
27.description: A young girl comes to an embittered town and confronts its attitude with her determination to see the best in life.

28.name: Village of the Damned
28.description: In the English village of Midwich, the blonde-haired, glowing-eyed children of uncertain paternity prove to have frightening powers.

29.name: Elmer Gantry
29.description: A fast-talking traveling salesman with a charming, loquacious manner convinces a sincere evangelist that he can be an effective preacher for her cause.

30.name: G.I. Blues
30.description: Tulsa, a soldier with dreams of running his own nightclub, places a bet with his friend Dynamite that he can win the heart of an untouchable dancer...but when Dynamite is transferred, Tulsa must replace him in the bet.

31.name: The Plunderers
31.description: When four rowdy cowhands ride into a small town and make trouble, no one seems willing or able to take them on, not even Sam Christy, the toughest man in town. But then there is a murder.

32.name: The Fugitive Kind
32.description: Valentine "Snakeskin" Xavier, a trouble-prone drifter trying to go straight, wanders into a small Mississippi town looking for a simple and honest life but finds himself embroiled with problem-filled women.

33.name: The Brides of Dracula
33.description: Vampire hunter Van Helsing returns to Transylvania to destroy handsome bloodsucker Baron Meinster, who has designs on beautiful young schoolteacher Marianne.

34.name: Le trou
34.description: In prison four long-sentence inmates planning an elaborate escape cautiously induct a new inmate to join in their scheme which leads to distrust and uncertainty.

35.name: Where the Boys Are
35.description: Four very different college girls drive to Fort Lauderdale, Florida for spring break and seek out various adventures and romance for themselves.

36.name: Seven Ways from Sundown
36.description: A Texas Ranger must capture an outlaw and take him-in, while tangling with savage Apaches and greedy bounty-hunters on the way back to jail.

37.name: Freckles
37.description: A California lumber baron hires a one-handed young man to guard 2,000 acres against timber thieves.

38.name: Babes in Toyland
38.description: Tom the Piper's Son is about to marry Mary Quite Contrary. On the eve of their wedding, evil miser Barnaby hires two henchmen to drown Tom and steal Mary's sheep, cared for by Little Bo ...                See full summary »

39.name: Circus of Horrors
39.description: In 1947 England, a plastic surgeon must beat a hasty retreat to France when one of his patients has ghastly problems with her surgery. Once there, he operates on a circus owner's daughter, ...                See full summary »

40.name: Let's Make Love
40.description: When billionaire Jean-Marc Clement learns that he is to be satirized in an off-Broadway revue, he passes himself off as an actor playing him in order to get closer to the beautiful star of the show, Amanda Dell.

41.name: Tunes of Glory
41.description: After World War II, a Highland Regiment's acting Commanding Officer, who rose from the ranks, is replaced by a peace-time Oxford-educated Commanding Officer, leading to a dramatic conflict between the two.

42.name: La ciociara
42.description: In the Italy of WWII, a widow and her lonely daughter seek for distance between them and the horrors of war.

43.name: North to Alaska
43.description: During the Alaska gold rush, prospector George sends partner Sam to Seattle to bring his fiancée but when it turns out that she married another man, Sam returns with a pretty substitute, the hostess of the Henhouse dance hall.

44.name: BUtterfield 8
44.description: A Manhattan call girl has a tragic affair with a rich married man.

45.name: L'amante del vampiro
45.description: A troupe of beautiful young dancers find themselves stranded in a sinister, spooky old castle, not knowing that it is home to a group of vampires.

46.name: Danger Tomorrow
46.description: A doctor and his wife move into an old house in an English village where he is to start a new job- over the next few days his wife begins to experience strange visions which makes her frightened that her life is in danger.

47.name: The Criminal
47.description: In UK, after pulling a racetrack robbery, repeat offender Johnny Bannion hides the loot in a farmer's field but the police and the local mob come looking for Johnny and for the money.

48.name: Pote tin Kyriaki
48.description: An American scholar in Greece sets about improving the prostitute with whom he is infatuated.

49.name: Saturday Night and Sunday Morning
49.description: A rebellious, hard-living factory worker juggles relationships with two women, one of whom is married to another man but pregnant with his child.

50.name: The World of Suzie Wong
50.description: A businessman moves to Hong Kong to pursue a career as an artist and falls in love with a prostitute he hires as a model.
